verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Now my sponsor did take me to Tres Dias
He told me I'd pray and cry all the day
I've sat till I hurt and my bottoms all numb now
Why did you leave me and go far away
Where oh where, are you tonight?
Why did you leave me here all alone?
I came to this weekennd a draggin' my feet
You sang "De Colores" and you were gone!
They told us to hush for most of the first night
But they just went right on talking themselves.
I feel like I might have been purt near brain washed
Cuz now I come runnin at the sound of a bell
Where oh where, are you tonight?
Why did you leave me here all alone?
I came to this weekennd a draggin' my feet
You sang "De Colores" and you were gone!
My stomach's all hurtin' with the fill of much candy
I've ate till I'm sick at the sight of some gum
I am constipated and scared to stand up now
Pass me the xlax and watch me go run
Where oh where, are you tonight?
Why did you leave me here all alone?
I came to this weekennd a draggin' my feet
You sang "De Colores" and you were gone!
The table of Peter looks like an explosion
There's raisins and snickers and cashews and stuff
There's coolers of ice cream and bars of milk chocolate
When will they say that enough is enough?
Where oh where, are you tonight?
Why did you leave me here all alone?
I came to this weekennd a draggin' my feet
You sang "De Colores" and you were gone!
The weekend's most over; my eyes are most swollen
The rector held so tight in his arms
He told me we were a child of our father
Jesus died for us so we could live on
